project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Design and implement a simple text-based game where players can navigate through rooms, pick up items, view their inventory, and encounter challenges.

task.name: Design game architecture and room layout
Implement inventory system for picking up items
Implement item usage and interaction with challenges
Write tests for the navigation, inventory, and challenge interactions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
